member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.Bluetooth.GetAvailabilityAsync
member.summary: Returns true if Bluetooth is physically available and user has given the app permission.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.Bluetooth.RequestDeviceAsync(InTheHand.Bluetooth.RequestDeviceOptions)
member.summary: Performs a device lookup and prompts the user for permission if required.
member.returns: A BluetoothDevice or null if unsuccessful.

member.name: E:InTheHand.Bluetooth.Bluetooth.AvailabilityChanged
member.summary: Bluetooth availability has changed, for example by disabling the radio or revoking user permission.

member.name: E:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice.GattServerDisconnected
member.summary: Fired when an active GATT connection is lost.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothLEScanFilter.Services
member.summary: List of service UUIDs which a device must expose to match the filter.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothLEScanFilter.Name
member.summary: If present requires a device to exactly match the supplied name.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothLEScanFilter.NamePrefix
member.summary: If present requires a device name to start with the supplied prefix.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUtiAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to attach a Uniform Type Identifier to a Bluetooth UUID.
member.remarks: Usage on a class indicates a namespace such as org.bluetooth.characteristic and on a field represents the individual name.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUtiAttribute.Uti
member.summary: Uniform Type Identifier e.g. 'org.bluetooth.service.generic_access'.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid
member.summary: Represents a Bluetooth UUID. Can be expressed as a Guid or a short ID for documented Bluetooth SIG definitions.
Provides conversion support for CBUUID.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.op_Equality(InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid,InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid)
member.summary: Returns true if both Uuids are equal.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.op_Equality(InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns true if both Uuids are equal.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.op_Inequality(InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid,InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid)
member.summary: Returns true if both Uuids are unequal.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.op_Inequality(InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns true if both Uuids are unequal.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.Value
member.summary: The full underlying value as a .

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.Empty
member.summary: A default Uuid containing a zero Guid.
member.value: This is not a valid value so be careful passing this to any native function.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.FromShortId(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Returns the bluetooth device UUID from a short ID.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.TryGetShortId(System.Guid)
member.summary: Attempts to get the short Bluetooth ID from a UUID.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.FromId(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the Uuid for a given Bluetooth SIG name. Names must beging with the "org.bluetooth" prefix.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.ClientCharacteristicDescriptorValue
member.summary: Indicates the state of the Client Characteristic Configuration descriptor.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.ClientCharacteristicDescriptorValue.None
member.summary: Neither notification nor indications are enabled.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.ClientCharacteristicDescriptorValue.Notify
member.summary: Characteristic notifications are enabled.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.ClientCharacteristicDescriptorValue.Indicate
member.summary: Characteristic indications are enabled.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic
member.summary: Represents a GATT Characteristic, which is a basic data element that provides further information about a peripheral’s service.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.Service
member.summary: The GATT service this characteristic belongs to.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.Uuid
member.summary: The UUID of the characteristic.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.Properties
member.summary: The properties of this characteristic.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.UserDescription
member.summary: Get the user friendly description for this GattCharacteristic, if the User Description Descriptor is present, otherwise this will be an empty string.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.Value
member.summary: The currently cached characteristic value. This value gets updated when the value of the characteristic is read or updated via a notification or indication.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.WriteValueWithResponseAsync(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Performs a Characteristic Value write to a Bluetooth LE device.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties
member.summary: Specifies the values for the GATT characteristic properties as well as the GATT Extended Characteristic Properties Descriptor.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.None
member.summary: The characteristic doesn’t have any properties that apply.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.Broadcast
member.summary: The characteristic supports broadcasting

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.Read
member.summary: The characteristic is readable

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.WriteWithoutResponse
member.summary: The characteristic supports Write Without Response

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.Write
member.summary: The characteristic is writable

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.Notify
member.summary: The characteristic is notifiable

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.Indicate
member.summary: The characteristic is indicatable

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.AuthenticatedSignedWrites
member.summary: The characteristic supports signed writes

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.ExtendedProperties
member.summary: The ExtendedProperties Descriptor is present

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.ReliableWrites
member.summary: The characteristic supports reliable writes

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.WriteableAuxiliaries
member.summary: The characteristic has writable auxiliaries

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicUuids
member.summary: Provides characteristic UUIDs for common GATT characteristics.

member.returns: The characteristic Uuid on success else Guid.Empty.

member.summary: Open a connection to the remote GATT server.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RemoteGattServer.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects the remote GATT server.
member.remarks: Some platforms do not have an explicit Disconnect and will keep the connection open until there are no references to associated services and characteristics.

member.summary: Returns the primary service matching the specified UUID.
member.param: The requested service or null if not present.
